resources.string: That did not work! Try again
In order to be able to answer questions you have to enable GPS and check in. After your check in, you will be given some time to answer all questions without the need to check in again.
We are checking your coordinates to make sure that your position is correct. If you see the green bar, your position is validated and you can check in to nearby locations
TripQuiz Alert notifies you when you are close to a location
You can check in at several locations
